comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message indicating that a folder has been successfully copied. It typically appears as part of an info panel or UI element displaying actions taken on folders.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Թղթապանակները պատճենված են:' literally translates to 'The folders are copied.' While understandable, a more natural and idiomatic Armenian translation for 'Folders copied.' would be something like 'Պատճենվեցին թղթապանակները' (Patchenvts'ien thğţ'apanaknnerə) or 'Թղթապանակները պատճենվել են' (Thğţ'apanaknnerə patchenvel en).

The Lao translation 'ໄຟລ໌ຖືກກ໊ອບ ໝົດແລ້ວ' translates to 'Files have been copied.' The English content 'Folders copied' refers to a plural form. It should be 'ໄຟລ໌ຖືກກ໊ອບໝົດແລ້ວ' which more accurately conveys 'folders'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໄຟລ໌ຖືກກ໊ອບໝົດແລ້ວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ෆෝල්ඩර් පිටපත් කරන ලදී.' implies 'folders were being copied', suggesting an ongoing process, while the English 'Folders copied' indicates completion. A more accurate translation would emphasize the finished action.

While the translation is understandable, "Фолдери су копирани" is a literal translation. A more natural Serbian (Cyrillic) phrasing would be 'Копирани су фолдери.' or 'Премештени фолдери.' depending on the context.
While technically correct, "Folderi su kopirani" is a bit stiff and doesn't flow naturally. A more idiomatic translation would be "Prekopani folderi" or "Folderi prekopani".

While technically correct, "Đã sao chép các thư mục" is a bit literal and less natural than other options.  A more natural phrasing would be something like "Các thư mục đã được sao chép" or simply "Đã sao chép thư mục".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Các thư mục đã được sao chép.
